snippet: Pilobolus, known for its abstract ensemble pieces, tries a more traditional form of dance via an unconventional source.
abstract: Skyscrapers collaborative piece from Pilobolus, choreographed by Trish Sie and Renee Jaworski, is based on a music video that Sie choreographed for the rock band OK Go, for which her brother is the lead singer; dance group is known for its abstract ensemble pieces.
lead_paragraph: Pilobolus, known for its abstract ensemble pieces, tries a more traditional form of dance via an unconventional source.

headline.seo: Pilobolus Takes On a Tango Inspired by a Music Video
headline.main: From Video to the Stage, It Takes Several to Tango
headline.print_headline: From Video to the Stage, It Takes Several to Tango
